title: Which movies got ruined because of the coronavirus pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: The biggest movie that got ruined is the Angrezi medium. Though the movie intention, storyline , execution, actors and every moment was just magical but the movie loses its base after the corona pandemic occurred and movie theaters were shut by the government. It becomes an economical disaster but still, it's reviews and IIMB rating was high. I think this movie demands and needs a second chance.
